name: KSUM NOLE
description: An iconic entrepreneur and visionary, Ksum can run four businesses simultaneously. His impressive portfolio boasts space projects that move at the speed of light, electric cars and the audacity to inhabit new planets. Smashing through new frontiers and paradigms of both space and time, Ksum is the ultimate innovator. Not short of a dollar, he is revolutionising trillion-dollar industries at the drop of hat.
